markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reset the Past](/Feats.aspx?ID=3857) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 187</row>

**Archetype** [Chronoskimmer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=192)

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You manipulate time to recharge one of your temporal techniques—by revising your past so you never used it in the first place. Select one of your chronoskimmer feats that has a frequency of once per day (or more frequent) that you've already used. You can use the feat again, as if you hadn't used it already.
name: Reset the Past
